newsletter.executive_overview: Tensions in the Strait of Hormuz—handling ~20% of global oil trade—have escalated dramatically in early February 2026. Military drills and drone incidents pose immediate risks to market stability.

geopolitics.event: Iran announced live-fire exercises beginning Feb 1, 2026, amid warnings of potential US intervention.
The administration ordered a "massive armada" to the region; unsafe behavior will not be tolerated.
A February 2026 drone strike spiked shipping insurance rates by 15-25%.
